title: That feel when you are "Attempting to reconnect" in the middle of a teamfight

replies.body: And then you reconnect and you somehow got a quad with Nami.

And you are all like:
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9G0rfjjXVS0/U2F8tOVHUII/AAAAAAAAEY8/T5GHrHbanRw/s1600/112exd2.gif
10/10 Phreak would be proud
{{champion:105}}

{{champion:67}} : That is not a problem.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IGthbjv8qag

> [{quoted}](name=Zyohex,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=O63pLG3W,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-29T19:29:41.876+0000)
>
> {{champion:67}} : That is not a problem.
> 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IGthbjv8qag

And people say Vayne is hard

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RtlRB9dzNi0

indeed they did, you just sit there and get a penta
She moved 3 feet towards heimer right at the end. FAIL. Someone report that Vayne: Unskilled AFKing.
no... with autoattack on in options champions will attack fleeing targets until the target's vision is lost
A true pro would never make such a foolish mistake with a checkbox. I stand by my original declaration: UNSKILLED AFKING.
yeah i noticed it too, but the fact that her spells were out of cd and she didnt use them is kinda of questionable, i'd use everything everytime they were available
I dunno man. Do tumbles count as moving? You gotta draw the line somewhere.
And then you reconnect and murder your wife, burying her body in the corn field out back
What's wrong with you?

The GIF is from the film adaptation of a Stephen King short story, 'Secret Window, Secret Garden'. Lol. Johnny Depp plays a writer that slowly goes insane over the course of the film, and then at the end he murders his wife and then buries her in his garden. I guess that comment makes me seem a bit crazy if you don't get the reference...
How should i feel, as i got the reference?

THIS.

ITS SO ANNOYING.

Ill go 0/11 because my champ is sliding and teleporting everyehere. Its upsetting because it makes me look like a bad Morde main. :( But when Comcast isnt acting wierd, I carry hard. 20, 30, 40, 50 kills as Mord...TOP HUEHUEHUE

Ill have to play LEAUGE OF STOPMOTION!
The most kills I ever got was 40 kills with zed in ranked
Mine was Top Mordekaiser 54 kills

Although, ive had it where I still did well with freeze frame lag. I assume what the enemy will do with each picture, and press abilities Id use. And time heals based on how fast they take my life. 

Got some triples and a quadra thru terribad lag before, but I had gotten fed as Mord before Comcast began to act up, so, I was lucky
Upvoting for johnny depp.
That's me when I get that "message" at ANY point in the game!!!
